author: Leila Rufino
title: Promise Me You’ll Stay
text:
Adrian Sava baby, please
break me
take my hand
and hold it
so fucking
tight
that it bleeds
through yours
pull me close
no — closer
until you hear
my ribs
break
and fall apart
like the way
we did
kiss me —
hard
don’t pull away
destroy me
until you
taste
the metallic flavor
of blood
from my lips
make me
scream
so fucking loud
until you hear
the deafening
silence
that has been
killing me
since the day
you left
baby, please
hold me
love me
tear me apart
break my bones
the way you broke
my heart
go ahead
push me away
rip out my veins —
just promise
you’d stay
i don’t care
if you’re
the fire
that’ll burn me
to the ground
because, maybe
just maybe —
when I’m in ashes
you’d finally
stick around.
